ygData.subject: Fw: Mystic Cloak Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a bug where if you sneak, you can use merchants/bankers that are dubious, not sure about threatening or scowling though...you have to be standing
ygData.messageBody:
There is a "bug" where if you sneak, you can use merchants/bankers that are
dubious, not sure about threatening or scowling though...you have to be
standing *behind* them for it to work and I've never tested it with invis
but I'm pretty sure the target creature has to be dubious. *but* Even if
you could get the cloak off the enchanter in najena...are you about to
attempt infiltrating Felwithe while invis? Sounds like suicide to me, not
to mention a nightmare of a corpse recovery mission. Get a molten cloak ;)
and make up the 1 int somewhere else.

----- Original Message -----
From: Gabriel Kang <chaotic@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 03, 1999 12:37 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Mystic Cloak Quest


> From: Gabriel Kang <chaotic@...>
>
> hi !
>
> I heard from some sources (not sure where since i already deleted the
mail) that
> quests are able to be completed while under Invisibility .
>
> They stated examples by completing the Mystic Cloak quest
> (8ac +5int +5sv magic 10 charges SteelSkin) .
>
> A few days later i attempted to try this out myself by camping
> the Priest of Najena in Unrest . It was a 52 min spawn and more
> often than not spawns a regular Ghoul as a placeholder (PH).
>
> After 16 long hours of waiting in line (only 2 spawned) and getting
> the component off the Priest i made off to Najena to complete part
> 1 of the quest . unfortunately when i tried to give it to the NPC while
> invis , it broke the invisibility and i was charmed and killed by the NPC
> (who is a High Elf Enchanter btw) .
>
> Has anybody else attempted to complete this quest ?
> or does anyone have confirmation if quests can be completed
> while invis ? pls email me directly as I dont always get the time
> to read all this list mails...
>
> regards,
>
> KAEN
> Necromancer of the 30th circle
> on Erollisi Marr .
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
